GSD.description:
HID: bigben: fix slab-out-of-bounds Write in bigben_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 2ab0a30f4f709f462d253bbb36fc64bb6de5a135. For more details please see the references link.
